Title: S3:E4 - What should developers know about online privacy? (Laura Kalbag)
Description: Many companies use cookies, tracking, and behavioral ads to help them sell more things. But it also means they collect a lot of data on what we do and who we are, raising online privacy concerns. What does that mean for developers? Laura Kalbag explains how those tools work and what we as developers should think about when building our own products. Show Links Partner with Dev & CodeNewbie!
